titles: Honors fame in triumph riding. Or, The life and death of the late honorable Earle of Essex
author: Pricket, Robert.
publisher: Printed by R. B[lower] for Roger Iackson, and are to be solde at his shoppe in Fleet-streete, neere the Conduit,
notes: Dedication signed: R.P., i.e. Robert Pricket.
Running title reads: Honours fame, in triumph riding.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
